channel.title: Navigating the Consultation space
channel.description:
I've spent the last 15 minutes trying (and failing) to get to the discussion on the 2.02 standard. Consultations seemed to be a logical place but it's not here. It's not under IATI Standard either - there I did find the post announcing the 2.02 consultation calls, and several older discussions, but no link to the actual 2.02 discussion. And there's no button to get back to the IATI homepage from the Discuss spaces, to make it easier to explore from the Standards page.
I think we would have more engagement from IATI members if the discussion spaces were easier to navigate and better integrated with the rest of the website(s).
Cheers

item.title: Navigating the Consultation space
item.dc:creator: bill_anderson
item.description:
Apologies Yohanna

Upgrades have not yet been migrated from the pre-Discuss forum. You can find the consultation at http://support.iatistandard.org/forums/21251175-2-02-Decimal-Upgrade-Proposals.

Read full topic

item.title: Navigating the Consultation space
item.dc:creator: YohannaLoucheur
item.description:
I’ve spent the last 15 minutes trying (and failing) to get to the discussion on the 2.02 standard. Consultations seemed to be a logical place but it’s not here. It’s not under IATI Standard either - there I did find the post announcing the 2.02 consultation calls, and several older discussions, but no link to the actual 2.02 discussion. And there’s no button to get back to the IATI homepage from the Discuss spaces, to make it easier to explore from the Standards page.

I think we would have more engagement from IATI members if the discussion spaces were easier to navigate and better integrated with the rest of the website(s).

Cheers
